                throws IllegalInputException,
                       IntegerValuesException
        Description: The initialize function of the fxml file, called as soon as the graphical interface is loaded.

        IntegerValuesException - Thrown when the values entered are not integers.

      • endLevelOne

        public void endLevelOne(int stage,
                        int condition)
        Description: This function is utilized to end the level one once Mario reaches the end.
        Parameters:
        stage - The stage of the animation in order to know which animation of the ending cinematic to play.
        condition - The condition to know which action to take in each stage.

        Description: This function deactivates all the threads that are currently running in the game.

        Description: This function is responsible of animating Mario and restarting the level he's in once he dies.

      • isTouching

        public java.lang.String isTouching()
        Description: This function is responsible of telling if Mario is touching any other figure in the game. For every function he touches, there is a specific action that has to take place or a part of the game to be handled. In other words, it's the function responsible of handling every interaction of Mario with other figures.
        Returns:
        A string representing the side in which Mario collided with the other figure.

      • animateMisteryBlockCoin

        public void animateMisteryBlockCoin(javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle r,
                                    int iteration,
                                    int move)
        Description: This function is responsible of animating the mystery block when it has a coin.
        Parameters:
        r - The rectangle of the coin animation.
        iteration - The iteration to know which animation to play.
        move - The movement that has to take place, if any at all.

      • exitPowerUp

        public void exitPowerUp(javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle r,
                        PowerUp p,
                        int iteration)
        Description: This function does the animation of the power up when it comes out.
        Parameters:
        r - The rectangle that represents the power up.
        p - The power up of this rectangle figure.
        iteration - The iteration to know which animation to play.

                             Enemy e,
                             javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle gRec)
        Description: This function changes the image of the enemy depending on which direction it's moving.
        Parameters:
        a - It represents the animation that has to play.
        e - It's the enemy that has to have it's image changed.
        gRec - The rectangle that represents the enemy in the graphical interface.

      • isBetween

        public Figure isBetween(double yFinal,
                        double yActual)
        Description: This function determines whether or not Mario is between any block.
        Parameters:
        yFinal - The final y position in the jump.
        yActual - The actual y position in the jump.
        Returns:
        The figure that Mario is colliding with or null if there isn't any.

        Returns:

      • isFigureFalling

        public boolean isFigureFalling(Figure figure,
                               javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle figureRec)
        Description: This function tests if a figure is on something or it's falling.
        Parameters:
        figure - The figure that is going to be tested.
        figureRec - The rectangle that represents the figure in the graphical interface.
        Returns:
        False if the figure is falling and true if it isn't.

      • spinFire

        public void spinFire(javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle fireRec,
                     Figure fire,
                     int f,
                     int radius,
                     int centerX,
                     int centerY)
        Description: This function makes the fire wheels in the third level spin.
        Parameters:
        fireRec - The rectangle that represents the fire in the fire wheel.
        fire - The figure that represents the fire.
        f - The number of degrees that the fire has.
        radius - The radius of the wheel.
        centerX - The x center coordinate of the fire wheel.
        centerY - The y center coordinate of the fire wheel.

        Parameters:

      • moveEnemy

        public void moveEnemy(javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle enemyRec,
                      Enemy enemy,
                      int changer)
               throws java.io.IOException
        Description: This function moves an enemy, it's utilized by the enemy thread.
        Parameters:
        enemyRec - The rectangle that represents the figure in the graphical interface.
        enemy - The enemy figure in the model.
        changer - The image that it has to be changed to.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If the image file is not found.

      • animateStar

        public void animateStar(PowerUp powerUp,
                        javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle powerUpRectangle,
                        int counter,
                        int moment,
                        int orientation)
        Description: This function is responsible of animating the star.
        Parameters:
        powerUp - The star power up to change the image.
        powerUpRectangle - The rectangle that represents the star power up.
        counter - The counter that represents the image that has to be changed.
        moment - The moment of the animation that is taking place.
        orientation - The orientation of the star power, that is, the direction in which it's moving.
